ScriptConfig._comment_AskUrlsTxt: true = ask for using Urls.txt (default), false = don't ask
ScriptConfig._comment_DownloadPath: set a default path here, path will not be asked (make sure to use / and not one of these \, if empty = path asked in terminal (default)
ScriptConfig._comment_AskPath: true = ask the path for the file (default), false = don't ask the path
ScriptConfig._comment_FileName: set a default file name here, please don't insert an file extension in the file name
ScriptConfig._comment_AskFileName: true = ask the name for each files (default), false = use default name for every files
ScriptConfig._comment_AskUnspecifiedPath: true = if a path option is incorrect in urls.txt, a manual console input will be necessary for the path, false = the urls will be ignored if their path is incorrect
ScriptConfig._comment_logs: true = A logs.txt file will be created, return and errors will be saved, false is the default value
ScriptConfig._comment_verbose: true = Error and return will be more detailed, can be useful for debugging, false is the default value
ScriptConfig._comment_FavoriteFileExtension: set the favorite file extension (will be used if possible)

headers.User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:136.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/136.0
